thread.title: Experience the California Coast at 7 Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts [SLIDESHOW]
thread.title_full: Experience the California Coast at 7 Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts [SLIDESHOW]

author: Rebekah Bell
title: Experience the California Coast at 7 Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts [SLIDESHOW]
text:
Rebekah Bell JULY 30, 2015 
For anyone who has dreamed of road-tripping along the California coast, a special new tour offered by the Four Seasons Hotels and Resorts is a dream come true. From September 1 to November 30, seven Four Seasons properties are hosting the first-ever Four Seasons Suite Hotel California Coastal Tour , a vacation package that lets guests experience a highlight reel of the Golden State’s most scenic locales. At each stop, participants will engage in a special local activity—such as sailing on the San Francisco Bay or paddleboarding in Malibu—and stay two nights in a Four Seasons suite. Guests can choose to participate in the entire experience (starting at any of the locations) or select certain legs of the journey. This one-of-a-kind trip will inspire you to pull out your aviators, order a burrito, and begin California dreamin’. ( fourseasons.com )
